english.segment1: Gotta give me something that will last. Someone that won't judge my past. Give me a future that is bright. open my eyes to the light
english.segment2: I love God and God loves me. He sets the chosen people free, today
english.segment3: He is the way the truth and light. He is the way I'll say I'm right. He gives me hope and He gives me peace. His grace and love will never cease.
